import React from'react';import'./CheckoutItem.styles.scss';import{connect}from'react-redux';import{addItemToCart,clearItemFromCart as _clearItemFromCart,removeItem as _removeItem}from'../../redux/cart/cart.actions';var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{clearItemFromCart:function clearItemFromCart(item){return dispatch(_clearItemFromCart(item));},addItem:function addItem(item){return dispatch(addItemToCart(item));},removeItem:function removeItem(item){return dispatch(_removeItem(item));}};};var CheckoutItem=function CheckoutItem(props){console.log(props);var imageUrl=props.imageUrl,name=props.name,quantity=props.quantity,price=props.price,clearItemFromCart=props.clearItemFromCart,addItem=props.addItem,removeItem=props.removeItem;//as props we need to pass cartItems but also the item itself in order to be able to add or remove another items to cart
